text: I think teh bvest path forward for something like thsi is to use the `history.pushState` API as shown here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/tracking_code_api/track_page_view>
That you can set the page title there, and the HubSpot tracking code will pick it up from that

I'm just reverting to using slideInLeft for now as that works on that page and I need to show this to my client in working order. If you have any suggestions on how to get the other animations, let me know.

Hello - trying to determine how to set a value in event.session from a javascript snippet that is called from a chatflow.  I have a bot that asks a bunch of qualifying questions, and then I go hit a back-end service, providing the parameters I gathered (via event.session.parsedResponses.modulename.parsedResponse).

I want to use the output from this backend call in a subsequent service call I make later in the chat flow.  How can I store/do that?
